name: Flourishing AI
description: Tokens will be used to pay for subscription services. Flourishing AI is the most advanced artificial intelligence and portfolio management insights solution in the market. The platform supports portfolio risk-adjusted returns by combining deep learning inference, active blockchain monitoring, high frequency trading, active portfolio rebalancing, automated arbitrage, target price probability analysis, and early pattern recognition of bull markets, or bear markets, or unexpected market events. Founded in 2020, Flourishing Capital is led by experienced entrepreneurs whoâ€™ve held key roles at Nvidia, Oracle, Gree, and Planview, with a combined three decades of experience in digital assets research and development, payments systems, scalable platform deployment, and acquisitions at companies such as Paypal.
